text: Saint-Martin-de-Connée is a former commune of 420 people (1999). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2021, it was merged into the new commune of Vimartin-sur- Orthe. == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Saint-Martin-de-Connée
